segments.text: If you are staying here for a few days , we ’ d be delighted to see you at our factory .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s very kind of you to say so . My associate and I will be interested in visiting your factory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let us know when you are free . We ’ ll arrange the tour for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I ’ ll give you a call this afternoon to set the time . There ’ s nothing like seeing things with one ’ s own eyes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s for sure . You ’ ll know our products better after the visit .
segments.speaker: S1
